马来西亚.summary: Malaysia's investment performance has proved strongly resilient in a turbulent global environment. The country attracted RM285.2 billion in approved investments during the first nine months of 2025
马来西亚.summary_zh: 马来西亚的投资表现已在动荡的全球环境中证明了其强大的韧性。该国在2025年前九个月吸引了2852亿令吉的批准投资。

industry_observations.text: [11-01-26 · 其他] MAS, SGX RegCo take steps to facilitate dual listings on SGX, Nasdaq
industry_observations.text_zh: [11-01-26 · 其他] 新加坡金融管理局（MAS）和新加坡交易所监管公司（SGX RegCo）采取措施以促进在新加坡交易所（SGX）和纳斯达克（Nasdaq）进行双重上市
industry_observations.summary: The proposed regulations will streamline the listing process by aligning with US practices.
industry_observations.summary_zh: 拟议的法规将通过与美国实践对齐来简化上市流程。
